page.title: 19Local News.
page.content: The police in Penarth are concerned about the way hooligans are causing damage and trouble at the new Leisure Centre in Cogan. The police have asked anyone witnessing anything like this to contact them immediately. The people in the area are very angry about the way this small group of youths is spoiling the enjoyment of others. People living in Dinas Powis are calling for a ban on heavy lorries using the village. There are fears that a serious accident could be caused because of the number and speed of the lorries. Plans to charge for entry to the National Museums in Cardiff and Penarth are not popular. We feel that this would stop many young people viewing part of their history, especially the children of those on low incomes.
